verbs.description: < p > President Donald Trump [V: is] expected to throw his full weight behind the powerful gun rights group on Friday at an event in Dallas.</p >
[ARGM-ADV: < p >] President Donald Trump is [V: expected] [ARG1: to throw his full weight behind the powerful gun rights group on Friday at an event in Dallas.</p] >
< p > [ARG0: President Donald Trump] is expected to [V: throw] [ARG1: his full weight] [ARG2: behind the powerful gun rights group] [ARGM-TMP: on Friday] [ARGM-LOC: at an event in Dallas.</p >]
